meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>lodge</kanji> is a form of <vocabulary>lodging</vocabulary>. It is also considered to be an <vocabulary>inn</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>hotel</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: <reading>Yah do</reading> (やど) what you must to get <vocabulary>lodging</vocabulary>s for the night. Whether that's an <vocabulary>inn</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>hotel</vocabulary> or whatever. <reading>Yah do</reading> what you gotta do.
